an4.123:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.123:1.4: So tadassadeti, tam nikameti, tena ca vittim apajjati.
an4.123:1.5: Tattha thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihari aparihino kalam kurumano brahmakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an4.123:1.7: Tattha puthujjano yavatayukam thatva yavatakam tesam devanam ayuppamanam tam sabbam khepetva nirayampi gacchati tiracchanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
an4.123:1.8: Bhagavato pana savako tattha yavatayukam thatva yavatakam tesam devanam ayuppamanam tam sabbam khepetva tasmimyeva bhave parinibbayati.
an4.123:1.9: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayam adhippayaso idam nanakaranam sutavato ariyasavakassa assutavata puthujjanena, yadidam gatiya upapattiya sati.
an4.123:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.123:2.2: So tadassadeti, tam nikameti, tena ca vittim apajjati.
an4.123:2.3: Tattha thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihari aparihino kalam kurumano abhassaranam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an4.123:2.4: Abhassaranam, bhikkhave, devanam dve kappa ayuppamanam.
an4.123:2.5: Tattha puthujjano yavatayukam thatva yavatakam tesam devanam ayuppamanam tam sabbam khepetva nirayampi gacchati tiracchanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
an4.123:2.6: Bhagavato pana savako tattha yavatayukam thatva yavatakam tesam devanam ayuppamanam tam sabbam khepetva tasmimyeva bhave parinibbayati.
an4.123:2.7: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayam adhippayaso idam nanakaranam sutavato ariyasavakassa assutavata puthujjanena, yadidam gatiya upapattiya sati.
an4.123:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajano sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.123:3.2: So tadassadeti, tam nikameti, tena ca vittim apajjati.
an4.123:3.3: Tattha thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihari aparihino, kalam kurumano subhakinhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an4.123:3.4: Subhakinhanam, bhikkhave, devanam cattaro kappa ayuppamanam.
an4.123:3.5: Tattha puthujjano yavatayukam thatva yavatakam tesam devanam ayuppamanam tam sabbam khepetva nirayampi gacchati tiracchanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
an4.123:3.6: Bhagavato pana savako tattha yavatayukam thatva yavatakam tesam devanam ayuppamanam tam sabbam khepetva tasmimyeva bhave parinibbayati.
an4.123:3.7: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayam adhippayaso idam nanakaranam sutavato ariyasavakassa assutavata puthujjanena, yadidam gatiya upapattiya sati.
an4.123:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.123:4.2: So tadassadeti, tam nikameti, tena ca vittim apajjati.
an4.123:4.3: Tattha thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihari aparihino kalam kurumano vehapphalanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an4.123:4.4: Vehapphalanam, bhikkhave, devanam panca kappasatani ayuppamanam.
an4.123:4.5: Tattha puthujjano yavatayukam thatva yavatakam tesam devanam ayuppamanam tam sabbam khepetva nirayampi gacchati tiracchanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
an4.123:4.6: Bhagavato pana savako tattha yavatayukam thatva yavatakam tesam devanam ayuppamanam tam sabbam khepetva tasmimyeva bhave parinibbayati.
an4.123:4.7: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayam adhippayaso idam nanakaranam sutavato ariyasavakassa assutavata puthujjanena, yadidam gatiya upapattiya sati.
an4.123:4.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
